Simple rope
Rarity:
Type: Loot
Slot: Back
Value: 5
Keyword: Climbing gear
Search
Keyword: 		Agility
Properties:
Bankable:     Droppable:
Sellable:     Tradable:

Rope has many uses, for example, mountaineering.

The Simple rope item is a loot item.

Requirements

This item has no requirements to use it.

Attribute

+1% Work efficiency While doing Agility.

Uses

This item may be equipped to your character.

Sources

Shop Purchases

Shop Name Location Region Item Type Stock Price
Adventurers' Guild Outpost Horn of Respite Jarvonia 1 2
Adventurers' Guild Swampost Halfmaw Hideout GDTE 1 2

Secondary Recipe Output

Recipe Name Skills Quantity Chance Odds Base
Rate 		W.E.A.R.‡
Upcycle trash Crafting lvl. 10 1 2.747% ~1 in 36 1,456 steps 910 steps

‡W.E.A.R is a value that shows the average steps for one item at maximum work efficiency.
